books.title: At home : a short history of private life
books.author: Bryson, Bill
books.subject: History
books.synopsis: Bryson takes readers on a tour of his house, a rural English parsonage, showing how each room has figured in the evolution of private life.

books.title: The Social Contract
books.author: Rousseau, Jean-Jacques
books.subject: Philosophy
books.synopsis: The Social Contract argued against the idea that monarchs were divinely empowered to legislate. Rousseau asserts that only the people, who are sovereign, have that all-powerful right.
